hero.title: Hi, I'm Igor Gomes!
hero.description: I'm based in Portugal and really passionate about web development, design and programming in general. With a good communication skill and an eye for detail and minimalist design, I bring creativity and dedication to my work. Currently looking for a Front-end Developer position.

first.title: LumberBeard
first.description: Landing page for a fictional beard products store.

second.title: Character Generator
second.description: Made to easily create a character for a RPG game, each characteristic is randomly generated.

third.title: Discord Bots
third.description: Showcase of my collection of discord bots, with the purpose of not only to show the bots but also how to setup and change accordingly.
